org.apache.reef.io.network

Interface Cache<K,V>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NameCache

    public interface Cache<K,V>
    Cache for network and naming services

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      V get(K key, Callable<V> valueFetcher)
      Returns a value for the key if cached; otherwise creates, caches and returns When it creates a value for a key, only one callable for the key is executed
      void invalidate(K key)
      Invalidates a key from the cache

    • Method Detail

    Callable<V> valueFetcher)
